price: (Ibliis) ni jedhe: "Waan ati na jallifteef, Dhugumatti, karaa kee qajeeloo irran isaaniif taa’a.
arabic: قَالَ فَبِمَآ أَغۡوَيۡتَنِي لَأَقۡعُدَنَّ لَهُمۡ صِرَٰطَكَ ٱلۡمُسۡتَقِيمَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: qāla fabimā aghwaytanī la-aqʿudanna lahum ṣirāṭaka al-mus'taqīma
